titleStmt.title: A brief enquiry into the true nature of schism: or a persuasive to Christian love and charity. Humbly submitted to better judgments; by M.H. Licensed Jan. 8. 1689/90
titleStmt.author: Henry, Matthew, 1662-1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns, in Cheapside, near Mercers Chapel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Christ College Library, Oxford.
